/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their white facades contrasting with the blue sky above. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. In the center of the image, a large tree stands tall, its green leaves adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image captures a typical day in Beijing, where tradition and modernity coexist harmoniously.
